# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="ae98a-102">Vytvoriť podpis e-mailu v programe Outlook na webe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ae98a-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="ae98a-103">ísť na</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ae98a-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="ae98a-104">**Nastavenia** > **Zobraziť Outlook nastavenia** > **Compose a odpoveď**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ae98a-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="ae98a-105">V skupinovom rámčeku **podpis e-mailu**, zadajte svoj podpis a využívať dostupné možnosti formátovania zmeniť jeho vzhľad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ae98a-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ae98a-106">*Poznámka:* Môžete mať iba jeden podpis pre konto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ae98a-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ae98a-107">Ďalšie informácie nájdete v téme [vytvoriť a pridať podpis e-mailu v Outlooku na webe](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ae98a-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
